name: Vegan Lasagna with Cashew-Basil Ricotta
description: Vegan Unripe Spelt Lasagna with Cashew-Spinach Ricotta - Super "cheesy" and yummy but healthy at the same time! :-)
recipeIngredient: Some  vegan cheese to sprinkle on top (Daiya or another brand of your choice)
1/2 cup fresh spinach or basil leaves
1/4 cup oat milk or other plant-based milk (it should be unsweetened)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the unripe spelt according to the instructions on the package.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the unripe spelt according to the instructions on the package.

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the vegetables into small pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Chop the vegetables into small pieces.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Then add the onion and garlic and sauté for a few minutes, until the onion is translucent.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Then add the onion and garlic and sauté for a few minutes, until the onion is translucent.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the vegetables and fry for another 2-3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the vegetables and fry for another 2-3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the cooked unripe spelt and the tomate paste and sauté for 3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Stir in the cooked unripe spelt and the tomate paste and sauté for 3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Deglaze with red wine. Reduce the heat and simmer for a minute. Then add the diced tomatoes and the vegetable broth and simmer for another 10 minutes. Season the sauce with salt, pepper, oregano, and soy sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Deglaze with red wine. Reduce the heat and simmer for a minute. Then add the diced tomatoes and the vegetable broth and simmer for another 10 minutes. Season the sauce with salt, pepper, oregano, and soy sauce.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, make the cashew-spinach ricotta. In a blender, combine the cashews, tofu, spinach, white wine vinegar, and oatmilk and blend until smooth, adding another splash of oatmilk if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, make the cashew-spinach ricotta. In a blender, combine the cashews, tofu, spinach, white wine vinegar, and oatmilk and blend until smooth, adding another splash of oatmilk if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a cup of the veggie-tomate sauce at the bottom of your casserole dish. Then add a layer of lasagna sheets, tomato sauce, and spinach ricotta. Continue with another layer of sauce, noodles and spinach ricotta. Put the rest of the veggie-tomate sauce on top and sprinkle with some vegan cheese (Daiya or the brand of your choice).

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 350 F (180 C) for 34-40 minutes.
